Quickstrike:




Quickstrike blinked at Black Arachnia. Things were going on that he 
missed. He looked around at the others. He saw this order as a little 
foolish. Why ruin a perfectly good ship?

"Where are we goin' after we do, sugar-bot? If we do destroy this 
ship, we ain't gonna have no protection."

He looked over to Tarantulas. "Think detonators will work?"
